Content: Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa visited Vidyalankara Pirivena this afternoon and received the blessings of the Maha Sangha. The Prime Minister called over on Venerable Dr. Welamitiyawe Kusaladhamma Thera at Peliyagoda Vidyalankara Pirivena and received his blessings. Thereafter he met Venerable Professor Kuburugamuwe Vajira Thera and exchanged views with him. The Maha Sangha chanted Seth Pirith and invoked blessings on the Prime Minister.
